title: Apartment for rent in Colombo 7
details:
This immaculate, professionally-designed apartment invites comfort, and exudes modern elegance. With 2 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, generous living space and stylish finishes, you'll enjoy a perfect setting for relaxing and entertainment.

Ground floor

Living and dining area
Pantry and kitchen
Powder room
Maids quarters

Mezzanine floor

2 bedrooms
2 bathrooms
small living area
